effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 4,823 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
